program.description: A powerful devkit for scaffolding new projects.
new.command.description: Create a new project from a template
new.project.description: Create a new {language} project with the '{template}' template: {description}
version.description: Output the current version of the CLI.
new.project.name.argument: The name of your new project
config.set.command.description:
Set a configuration value. 

Available keys:
  pm, packageManager      - Sets the default package manager to use for new projects.
                          Possible values: {pmValues}
  cache, cacheStrategy    - Sets the global caching behavior for remote templates.
                          Possible values: 'always-refresh', 'never-refresh', 'daily'
config.set.value.argument: The new value for the key
config.set.option.global: Update the global configuration instead of the local one.
config.init.command.description: Initializes a global configuration file with default settings.
error.invalid.value: Invalid value for {key}. Valid options are: {options}
error.config.parse: Failed to parse {file}. Using default configuration.
error.config.exists: File already exists at {path}. Use 'config set' to update it.
cache.copy.start: üìÇ Copying cached template to project directory...
cache.copy.fail: ‚ùå Failed to copy files from cache.
scaffolding.run.fail: ‚ùå Failed to run official CLI command.
error.scaffolding.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred during scaffolding.
warning.no.local.config: No local project configuration found. Using global or default settings.
warning.global.config.not.initialized: Global configuration not initialized. Run 'devkit config init' to create one.
error.package.root.not_found: Could not find project root containing package.json.
config.cache.command.description: Update the cache strategy for a specific template.
config.cache.template.argument: The name of the template to update
config.cache.success: Cache strategy for template '{template}' updated to '{strategy}'
config.cache.fail: Failed to update cache strategy for template '{template}'
command.config.cache.fail: Failed to update cache strategy for template '{template}'
